title: Day 299: If It’s Not All Right, Then It’s Not the End
description: Psalm 119:105–112, Jeremiah 52:31-33, Titus 1:1–9. There is a line in the film *The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel*: ‘Everything will be all right in the end… If it’s not all right, then it is not the end ’ Way beyond its context in the film, these words convey a profound theological truth
itunes:title: Day 299: If It’s Not All Right, Then It’s Not the End
itunes:subtitle: Psalm 119:105–112, Jeremiah 52:31-33, Titus 1:1–9. There is a line in the film *The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel*: ‘Everything will be all right in the end… If it’s not all right, then it is not the end ’ Way beyond its context in the film, these words convey a profound theological truth

itunes:author: Nicky and Pippa Gumbel
